tasks.name: shell-script-check
args: if ((git diff --staged --name-only | Select-String '\.sh$').Count -gt 0) { Write-Host '❌ ERROR: Shell script files detected in commit. This project only supports PowerShell scripts (.ps1).' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 } else { Write-Host '✅ No shell scripts found.' -ForegroundColor Green }
